content.rendered:
Directed by Siddharth Kumar Tewary.

Written by Jaya Misra. Vinod Sharma. Ranveer Pratap Singh. Amol Surve. Siddharth Kumar Tewary.

Cast Jaaved Jaaferi (Ravi Gupta). Shweta Tripathi (Sunaina). Swastika Mukherjee (Mala). Plabita Borthakur (Fetish Girl). Waluscha D’Souza (Gia). Ritvik Sahore (Aamcha Spider). Sumedh Mudgalkar (Dark Angel). Geetika Vidya Ohlyan (Sita). Jagjeet Sandhu (Nandu Mama). Aakanksha Singh (Devna). Mallika Singh (Srini Rangaswamy). Rohit Chandel (Meena Kumari). Aadhya Sharma (Dance Rani). Moni Rai (Inspector dharam). Karan Ashar (Hemant). Nitin Dahiya (Akash). Rohit Agarwal (Dev). Debbie Thokchom (Lily). Khuman Nongyai (Tashi). Diptesh Khera (Waiter) .Bushra Shaikh . Rajveer Singh Rajput (Contractor). Narendra Saini (Grooms father). Abhinav Kumar (Reporter). Ajay Madhok (Juvenile Incharge Sardar)

Language Hindi.

Producers Gayatri Gill. Ritesh Kaul. Mittal Sangle. Ravi Sarin. Nusrat Somjee. Rahul Kumar Tewary. Siddharth Kumar Tewary.

Production Spotless Films. One Life Studios.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 9

Status On Going (2022–)
